oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-10-20 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 20, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer - although George Morgan was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performer Benny Martin, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Dale Potter, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Benny Martin; Chet Atkins; Carl Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Carl Smith introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Benny Martin -- Whip-poor-will (Benny Martin) -- Carl Smith introduces Chet Atkins -- Hello My Baby (Chet Atkins) -- National Safety Council P.S.A. (Carl Smith) -- Wicked Lies (Carl Smith) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Carl Smith) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Potter, Dale; Jordanaires (Musical group); Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Martin, Benny
